properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Fernandina Beach to St. Augustine FL out 20 NM; Coastal waters from St. Augustine to Flagler Beach FL out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Altamaha Sound to Fernandina Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 22 at 2:19PM EST until January 23 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 20 to 25 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and seas 6 to 11 feet. For the Small Craft
Advisory, northeast winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
and seas 7 to 10 feet expected.

* WHERE...Southeast Georgia and Northeast Florida coastal waters
from Altamaha Sound GA to Flagler Beach FL out to 20 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 10 PM EST this evening. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 11 PM EST
Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM EST THURSDAY
